snippet.title: Puddle Knights - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer of Puddle Knights, a mud-based puzzle game, in which you use the lengthy capes of chivalrous knights to cover puddles and help members of the upper class away from badly sanitized streets. Solve your way through increasingly tricky puzzles in this lighthearted medieval mindmuck! Coming early 2020.

Wishlist now on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1180540/Puddle_Knights/

http://www.puddleknights.com
